title: CISA Flags Actively Exploited RoundCube Webmail Flaws
summary: CISA added two RoundCube vulnerabilities to KEV catalog, ordered federal agencies to patch immediately. Actively weaponized in the wild.

title: VulnCheck: <1% Vulns Exploited, But Weaponization Speed Up
summary: Less than 1% of vulnerabilities exploited last year, but speed and scale of weaponization increased dramatically. Attackers more selective but faster.

title: DFARS Clause Renumbering Effective Feb 1, 2026
summary: DFARS 252.204-7019 deleted, 252.204-7020 renumbered to 252.240-7997. Affects contract language and compliance docs. Client SSPs need updating.

title: Federal Cyber Priorities 2026: Resilience, AI, Workforce
summary: Fortinet federal CTO: 2026 defined by resilience, AI adoption, supply chain risk, workforce instability, and funding uncertainty.

title: 600+ FortiGate Appliances Breached via AI-Assisted Campaign
summary: Attacker leveraged AI tooling to exploit FortiGate appliances at scale, compromising 600+ devices.

title: Mississippi Healthcare System Shuts Down After Ransomware
summary: Multiple clinics forced to close following ransomware. Healthcare remains #1 targeted vertical.

title: Supply Chain Attacks: Fake Repos, Rogue Packages, Token Theft
summary: Malicious Next.js repos, rogue NuGet packages, GitHub Codespaces flaw. Non-human identity compromise exploding.

title: MSSP Alert: 2026 Blueprint — Platformization & NHI Explosion
summary: Non-human identities outnumber human identities 82:1 in enterprise. Winners = MSSPs that consolidate platforms and deliver outcomes.

title: Common Good Cyber Fund: $3.5M+ for Cybersecurity Nonprofits
summary: Internet Society Foundation. ~15 two-year grants. Open call June 23 to Aug 4, 2026.

title: Cisco SD-WAN Zero Day — CVE-2026-20127 (CVSS 10.0)
summary: Critical authentication bypass in Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Controller. Actively exploited since 2023.

title: SLCGP Extended + PILLAR Act — Federal Cyber Grant Funding
summary: Congress extended State and Local Cybersecurity Grant Program. Texas FY2026 postings live.
